AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.undocumented alien: individual being smuggled, part of a group that included Alma Delia Simon-Fernandez, transported by Inocencio Garcia-Guerrero for financial gain
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.nine undocumented aliens: group of nine undocumented immigrants being smuggled from Mexico to the United States, led by Inocencio Garcia-Guerrero
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.seven other undocumented aliens: additional group of seven undocumented immigrants being smuggled from Mexico to the United States, part of the larger group of nineteen
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.nineteen undocumented aliens: individuals being smuggled through South Texas, led by Inocencio Garcia-Guerrero, with inadequate water and food, subjected to substantial risk of death or serious bodily injury during the smuggling journey, transported unrestrained in the bed of a pickup truck
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Alma Delia Simon-Fernandez: person who died during the smuggling operation due to heat stroke caused by harsh conditions in the South Texas desert
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Inocencio Garcia-Guerrero: defendant, alien smuggler guide responsible for creating substantial risk of death or serious bodily injury to the undocumented aliens during the smuggling journey through South Texas
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.two undocumented aliens: adult males found severely dehydrated and showing acute signs of heat stroke near the emergency call box
